name: livedoc-mocha
author: Garry McGlennon
description: BDD extensions for Mocha that support LiveDoc reporting.

scripts.test-reporter: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-nocolor: mocha  --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-dev: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev --ui livedoc-mocha --ld-include dev --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-summary: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev -O detailLevel=summary --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-list: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev -O detailLevel=list --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-summary-file: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require livedoc-spec-dev --reporter livedoc-spec-dev -O "detailLevel=summary,output=results.txt, detail-list" --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.release-web: npm run compile-web && npm run compile-web-minify
